name: The Art of Making a Blend
description:
Dive into the world of coffee blending with this hands-on workshop, where you'll not only learn the essentials of crafting a balanced blend, but also create your own blend using some of our finest single-origin beans. 
Guided by our expert instructors, here's all that you can look forward to:  

Uncovering how origin, roast level, and processing shape flavour profiles.  
Tasting and evaluating a selection of single-origin coffees.
Experimenting with different combinations to create your perfect blend.
Sharing your creations and insights with fellow coffee enthusiasts and receiving personalised feedback.  

So, gear up for a sensory journey filled with rich aromas, vibrant flavours, and endless coffee possibilities!

name: Capsule to Concoctions
description:
Got a delicious coffee mocktail recipe that your friends keep asking you to craft? Well, it could be your ticket to exciting prizes. 
At Capsule to Concoctions, a mocktail making competition, use an espresso as the base to craft a mocktail that impresses our judges and take home a brand-new capsule machine or a thoughtful hamper! 
Rules and Regulations:  

Participants must use the provided coffee capsule machine to brew their coffee base.  
The use of additional coffee brewing equipment (e.g., espresso machines, French presses) is not permitted.  
Participants must demonstrate proficiency in operating the coffee capsule machine safely.  
Participants will be allotted only 10 minutes to make their coffee mocktails.  
The participants should also specify their ingredients and explain what their mocktail contains and why did they choose to make the same.  
Ingredients for the mocktail must be brought by the participants excluding the coffee capsule.  
Participants will have to use atleast 1 pod and a maximum of 2 can be used in their beverage.

Date: 22nd September 2024 (Sunday) Timings: 11 PM - 1 PM Venue:Delhi - Blue Tokai Roastery, Rajouri GardenMumbai - Blue Tokai Roastery, New Excelsior Cinemas, FortBengaluru - Blue Tokai Roastery, Koramangala 5th Block
